item.title: Ghost on AWS - success!
item.description: This is the third and final part of my first foray into AWS. You can read part 1 and part 2. AWS is great. Getting access is secure and easy and you can’t beat free. AWS is incredibly quick at spinning up new instances and once connected over SSH it is extremely fast - it rivals the feel of a local installation - almost no latency for me. After getting Ubuntu installed, I spent the last few evenings attempting to install Ghost per these instructions.

item.title: We landed here, on the internet, safely in one piece!
